column4: c0deMaster: Oh I thought he wanted to script it or something
you are probably correct... c0deMaster if you are trying to script something, you will need to get and parse the output of amixer settings... I can give you an example if you like.
c0deMaster: I don't think you need to parse anything, just give it the right arguments
if it is only ever going to be on a specific piece of hardware, no... otherwise you need to get the name/assignment
